titles.title: As The River Flows Into The Sea

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As the river flows into the sea and loses its identity.
That's how it is with you and me, in Christ.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As the mountains tall, rise into the sky,
so the Lord has called forth you and I,
to rise to greater heights, to make us pure in Christ.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
As the mountains tall, and the rivers deep, we'll move with God.
We will not sleep. Until the day, when we hear Him say,
My glory is on you to stay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
As the river flows into the sea and loses its identity.
That's how it is with you and me, in Christ.
